GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V APPROACHED BY PIRATES IN 06-18N 003-20E
   AT 270001Z JAN. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888, E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 030001Z FEB 18.
